entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Temiskaming Dam 03:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: NNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy except freezing rain over southern sections overnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over northern sections. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
